column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As my boyfriend was going to place an order for takeout today during happy hour
column2: we come to find out that there is no such thing as happy hour anymore. It's only on appetizers???? Apparently
column4: so just an FYI to all the local loyal customers that love happy hour. Wish they could have done something at least regarding the news but nothing... really disappointing
